channel.description: Recent content in Roadmap on Hegecoin docs

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: At Hege, we like to stay flexible so nothing is set in stone. The crypto market changes like the wind, so to stay relevant, we have to adapt.

item.title: Content and Brand
item.description: Brand is critical in achieving our goals, and that’s why it is always being adjusted, improved and adapted.

item.title: Chapter Unlocks
item.description: Chapter unlocks are what makes Hege, well, Hege!
